sentences.sContent: She held out her left hand.
a scar on the left side of his face
...Even in the age of open-plan offices and social networks some work is best left to the individual...
...Thousands of bees left a town after landing on the back of a car when their queen got stuck in its boot...
...Curious if the left hemispheres were indeed remaining awake to process information detected in the surrounding environment...
...if the left hemisphere was staying alert to keep guard in a strange environment...
...So it may seem rather strange that I have returned to college to finish the degree I left undone some four decades ago...
...A part time job is a good way to balance costs while ensuring there is enough time left over for both academic subjects and after-class activities...
...We will always be left with many questions and few facts...
...suggests there isa lot more left to do...

trans.tranOther: your left side is the side of your body that contains your heart
